page.title: 16TRANSPORT & TRADE,WRENINGHAM
page.content: {SPRATTS COACHES,}owned/operated by the Spratt family,employs 24 full & 6 part time staff,to maintain & drive the 27 coach fleet.The coaches mainly do pri- vate hire & contract work & carry some {1300 children per day}to school in the Norwich area.The fleet also operates throughout Britain & Europe on tours & private hire.Spratts has 2 of the most modern coaches on the road today with air suspension,central heating,double glazing,curtains,recliner seats,toilet & washroom & drinks machine & are fit- ted with Scania & Daf engines.{WELLS {ACCCESSORIES}started by the Wells' who moved here from London in 1966 has now produced millions of walnut gearlever knobs,many for export -first in a barn near their home -now in a workshop emp loying 7.The first employee had been a farm worker.Clock backs,windowframes & Lotus Cars'components are now made too
